testcase.classname: US1009 Expedia Multi Way Trip Half Empty Destination Error Check
testcase.name: Check if it gives an error message when the info boxes are half empty
testcase.system-out: Given The user opens the Expedia website....................................passed And The user sees Expedia's home page is visible............................passed And The user clicks on the flights..........................................passed And The user clicks on the Multi-city.......................................passed Then The user confirms that there is a Add Another Flight button............passed And The user clicks on the Multiway leaving from............................passed And The user adds a leaving flight for MultiWay.............................passed And The user clicks on the Search button....................................passed Then The user checks if the error message is displayed for the multi way trip when it is half empty.passed
